review: Not impressed can't view the prime library on it which makes it pointless and useless.
author: Derrick G

review: The chromecast is an awesome device that allows you to stream videos, pictures and more from your smartphone, computer, or tablet. I love using the chromecast in my bedroom before bed. I can control everything I need to (fast fwd, rewind, etc) all from my phone as well as selecting what is going to play.
author: pbs5025 "Palak Shah"

review: It is a very good product.
author: Pradeep yadav

review: This is my 2nd one (This one for the bedroom) and it works great.
author: William Burton

review: Awesome little device! Always impressed by Google's ingenuity
author: D. Fekete

review: I can stream Amazon Prime movies from my Android too. Love it.
author: DwanaP "Book Lover."

review: It's a chromecast.  It works great.  The only thing it needs is more app support, but hey, it's so cheap that I can deal with a few apps not casting.
author: Erik Korte

review: Everything was perfect! This product is the best! Thanks a lot!

review: I bought this because my friend recommend it to me.I'm returning it, I can't pick up a lot of channels it's not giving me what I though I would get from it.
